beer.beer_description:
Canned on 4/8/25

Oh, yeah…

Sometimes we get all verse, chorus, verse, rinse, repeat and we gotta SNAP TF OUT OF IT. Like, remember, we have SO many hops in the cooler - TOO MANY TBH - and there’s always some solid, old faithful varieties we might not be thinking about because NEW NEWER NEWEST, but let’s say we’re staring at Simcoe and Columbus and Centennial, which would make an excellent “classic” hop bill of pine, grapefruit, resin, dark fruits but also pop in a modern hazy PNW interpretation all like YES PLEASE! And so that’s what we did. We remembered and now you can too! Ok, what were we just about to do?

items.badge_description: Get some new gear! From beach days to backwoods hangs, crack a cold one and level up your summer swag courtesy of New Trail Brewing Co. and The Cooler Keg. Every outdoor check-in this summer gets you an entry to a free giveaway! ?
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 8 years on Untappd!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 470 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 95!

user.bio: Where will you be when the Craig Machine comes partyin' through?

items.badge_description: American Craft Beer Week, May 12-18, is our annual salute to the local breweries that keep our glasses full. Raise a glass to these hometown gathering places that give our communities their unique flavor. Cheers to American craft beer! Find a local craft brewery near you.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 75)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 76!

user.bio: Cheers to good beers.  Miss my Colorado brews but living the salt life in South FL. Barrel Of Monks Brewing(B.O.M.B.)

Instagram: iwannabeersedated

* Rating beers, but never twice! * ✊

items.checkin_comment: Cool can. Difficult to figure out name. Light haze. Thin head. Citrusy dank nose that follows to palate. Light body and mouthfeel.

user.bio: Let’s get rickety rickety wrecked sonnnn!!!!
